name: Poope
description: What is the project about? Poope is a meme coin-focused project that aims to address the challenges of insufficient sustained liquidity and limited highly liquid options within the meme coin market. It offers a specialized fork of GMX, known as Poope, which provides a decentralized perpetual exchange catering specifically to the needs of meme coins What makes your project unique? Poope stands out from traditional platforms by directly querying price feeds from Uniswap, the leading decentralized exchange for meme coins. History of your project. Poope was developed as a specialized fork of GMX to revolutionize the meme coin market. The team encountered challenges in building the Poopey Perp DEX, but through perseverance and hard work, they successfully completed testing on the testnet. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Following the successful testnet phase, the next milestone for Poope is the beta launch on the mainnet. What can your token be used for? The $POOPE token is the governance token, empowering holders with a say in the platform's operations. Additionally, $POOPE stakers receive a portion of the platform fees as incentives.
